001package xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.util;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.io.InputStream;
006import java.nio.file.Files;
007import java.nio.file.Path;
008import java.nio.file.PathMatcher;
009import java.nio.file.Paths;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.stream.Collectors;
013
014import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventReader;
015import javax.xml.stream.XMLInputFactory;
016import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
017import javax.xml.stream.events.Attribute;
018import javax.xml.stream.events.EndElement;
019import javax.xml.stream.events.StartElement;
020import javax.xml.stream.events.XMLEvent;
021
022import xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.lang.AppConstants;
023import xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.lang.XmlInputStream;
024import xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.model.Difficulty;
025import xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.model.Option;
026import xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.model.Question;
027
028/**
029 * IOUtilities class
030 * Provide implementation of reading questions from XML file
031 * 
032 * @author H.-P. Lam, Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University (XJTLU)
033 * @since 2024.09.10
034 * @since version 0.0.1
035 * @version Last modified: 2024.09.10
036 */
037public class IOUtilities implements AppConstants {
038
039        private static final IOUtilities INSTANCE = new IOUtilities();
040
041        private static final XMLInputFactory xmlInputFactory = XMLInputFactory.newInstance();
042
043        private static final void flushOutput() {
044                System.out.flush();
045                System.err.flush();
046        }
047
048        /**
049         * Read questions from the path provided
050         * 
051         * @param path path string contains the set of questions
052         * @return set of questions read
053         */
054        public static Question[] readQuestions(String path) {
055                if (null == path || path.isBlank())
056                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input path is null or empty!");
057                return readQuestions(Paths.get(path));
058        }
059
060        /**
061         * Read questions from the file provided
062         * 
063         * @param file contains the set of questions
064         * @return set of questions read
065         */
066        public static Question[] readQuestions(File file) {
067                if (null == file)
068                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input file is null!");
069                return readQuestions(file.toPath());
070        }
071
072        /**
073         * Read questions from the path provided
074         * 
075         * @param path path contains the set of questions
076         * @return set of questions read
077         */
078        public static Question[] readQuestions(Path path) {
079                if (null == path)
080                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input path is null!");
081                return INSTANCE.readQuestionsFromXml(path);
082        }
083
084        /**
085         * Default constructor - currently doing nothing
086         */
087        public IOUtilities() {
088        }
089
090        private Question[] readQuestionsFromXml(Path path) {
091                if (IS_VERBOSE)
092                        logMeesage("readQuestionsFromXml: " + path);
093
094                if (!Files.exists(path)) {
095                        logErrorMessage("Path \"" + path + "\" does not exist!");
096                        return null;
097                }
098                List<Path> filesToRead = null;
099                if (Files.isDirectory(path)) {
100                        if (IS_VERBOSE)
101                                logMeesage("path \"" + path + "\" is a folder.");
102
103                        try {
104                                PathMatcher xmlFileFiler = path.getFileSystem().getPathMatcher("glob:**/*.xml");
105                                filesToRead = Files.list(path)//
106                                                .filter(Files::isRegularFile)//
107                                                .filter(xmlFileFiler::matches) //
108                                                .collect(Collectors.toList());
109                        } catch (IOException e) {
110                                flushOutput();
111                                e.printStackTrace();
112                        }
113                } else if (Files.isRegularFile(path)) {
114                        if (IS_VERBOSE)
115                                logMeesage("path \"" + path + "\" is a file.");
116
117                        filesToRead = new ArrayList<>();
118                        filesToRead.add(path);
119                }
120
121                if (filesToRead.isEmpty()) {
122                        logErrorMessage("NO files to read!");
123                        return null;
124                }
125
126                if (IS_DEBUG)
127                        logMeesage("filesToRead.size=" + filesToRead.size());
128
129                List<Question> questions = new ArrayList<>();
130                for (Path p : filesToRead) {
131                        logMeesage("read questions from file \"" + p + "\"");
132                        try (final InputStream ins = Files.newInputStream(p)) {
133                                List<Question> newQuestions = readQuestionsFromXml(ins);
134                                if (null == newQuestions || newQuestions.isEmpty()) {
135                                        logErrorMessage("** File \"" + p + "\" does not contain any question!");
136                                        continue;
137                                } else {
138                                        logMeesage("-- " + newQuestions.size() + " new questions are found!");
139                                        questions.addAll(newQuestions);
140                                }
141                        } catch (Exception e) {
142                                e.printStackTrace();
143                        }
144                }
145                return questions.toArray(new Question[0]);
146        }
147
148        private List<Question> readQuestionsFromXml(InputStream ins) throws XMLStreamException {
149                XMLEventReader reader = xmlInputFactory.createXMLEventReader(new XmlInputStream(ins));
150
151                List<Question> newQuestions = new ArrayList<>();
152
153                String topic = null;
154                Difficulty difficulty = Question.DEFAULT_DIFFICULTY;
155                String questionString = null;
156                List<Option> options = null;
157
158                while (reader.hasNext()) {
159                        XMLEvent nextEvent = reader.nextEvent();
160                        if (IS_DEBUG)
161                                logMeesage(nextEvent.toString());
162                        if (nextEvent.isStartElement()) {
163                                StartElement startElement = nextEvent.asStartElement();
164
165                                switch (startElement.getName().getLocalPart()) {
166                                case "question" -> {
167                                        topic = null;
168                                        difficulty = Question.DEFAULT_DIFFICULTY;
169                                        questionString = null;
170                                        options = new ArrayList<>();
171
172                                        Attribute questionDifficulty = startElement.getAttributeByName(Model.TAG_DIFFICULTY);
173                                        if (null != questionDifficulty) {
174                                                try {
175                                                        Difficulty diff = Difficulty.valueOf(questionDifficulty.getValue().toUpperCase());
176                                                        difficulty = null == diff ? Question.DEFAULT_DIFFICULTY : diff;
177                                                } catch (Exception e) {
178                                                        if (IS_VERBOSE) 
179                                                                logErrorMessage(e.getMessage());
180                                                }
181                                        }
182                                }
183                                case "topic" -> {
184                                        topic = reader.nextEvent().asCharacters().toString();
185                                }
186                                case "questionString" -> {
187                                        questionString = reader.nextEvent().asCharacters().toString();
188                                }
189                                case "option" -> {
190                                        String optionStr = reader.nextEvent().asCharacters().toString();
191                                        if (IS_DEBUG)
192                                                logErrorMessage("optionStr: " + optionStr);
193                                        Attribute correctAnswer = null;
194                                        try {
195                                                correctAnswer = startElement.getAttributeByName(Model.TAG_ANSWER);
196                                        } catch (Exception e) {
197                                                if (IS_VERBOSE) 
198                                                        logErrorMessage(e.getMessage());                                                
199                                        }
200                                        boolean isCorrectAnswer = null == correctAnswer ? false
201                                                        : "true".equalsIgnoreCase(correctAnswer.getValue());
202                                        if (IS_DEBUG)
203                                                logMeesage("corractAnswer: " + isCorrectAnswer);
204                                        Option option = Option.newInstance(optionStr, isCorrectAnswer);
205                                        options.add(option);
206                                }
207                                default -> {
208                                        if (IS_DEBUG)
209                                                logErrorMessage("unrecognized element: " + startElement.getName().getLocalPart());
210                                }
211                                }
212                        } else if (nextEvent.isEndElement()) {
213                                EndElement endElement = nextEvent.asEndElement();
214                                switch (endElement.getName().getLocalPart()) {
215                                case "question" -> {
216                                        Question newQuestion = Question.newInstance(topic, difficulty, questionString, options);
217                                        newQuestions.add(newQuestion);
218                                }
219                                default -> {
220                                        if (IS_DEBUG)
221                                                logErrorMessage("unrecognized element: " + endElement.getName().getLocalPart());
222                                }
223                                }
224                        }
225                }
226                return newQuestions.isEmpty() ? null : newQuestions;
227        }
228        
229        private void logMeesage(String message) {
230                flushOutput();
231                System.out.println(message);
232                flushOutput();
233        }
234        private void logErrorMessage(String message) {
235                flushOutput();
236                System.err.println(message);
237                flushOutput();
238        }
239
240}
